alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:06PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Stevens and northeastern Ferry Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 506 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles northeast of Sherman Pass moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pierre Lake Campground and Orient. This includes U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 256 and 262. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
